snippet: Olympia Dukakis will play a female version of the magician Prospero in a production of "The Tempest" this summer at Shakespeare & Company, based in Lenox, Mass.
abstract: Olympia Dukakis will play a female version of the magician Prospero in a production of "The Tempest" this summer at Shakespeare & Company, based in Lenox, Mass.
lead_paragraph: Olympia Dukakis will play a female version of the magician Prospero in a production of "The Tempest" this summer at Shakespeare & Company, based in Lenox, Mass., the theater announced on Tuesday. She will be joined on stage by her brother, Apollo Dukakis, who will play Gonzalo, and Rocco Sisto as Caliban.

headline.main: Olympia Dukakis to Play Prospero for Shakespeare & Company
